meaningMnemonic: A man in a leather jacket <kanji>scold</kanji>s you and is using <kanji>fear</kanji> tactics to get paid. He's <vocabulary>blackmailing</vocabulary> you! That's illegal. Come to think of it, he's probably a member of the yakuza. You should move.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
